name: Orbs Cards
description:
FOR BEST QUALITY, PLAY GAME IN FULLSCREEN (F11 or fn + F11 on keyboard) O.R.B.S. Card Game Original Recreated Battle Simulation Card Game

A simple card game with simple mechanics. Rules can be found in game after the title screen at the top right. It is suggested you view both the rules and the deck you wish to use before the game.

To view a deck, click the deck you wish to view, then click the "View Deck" button at the top right.

More decks coming very soon, including a dragons deck, orcs lands deck, space deck, and cyber steam - punk deck! Stay tuned!

You'll be able to build your own decks after Alpha Testing is done!
